name: Acak Kata - Smart Word Shuffle
description:
SALE AT 70% OFF !!!

Hours of fun guaranteed! This game is well designed to entertain and to accompany you relax. Take a cup of coffee, chocolate, or whatever you like and enjoy playing this game. Hopefully you cheerful!

Acak Kata - Smart Word Shuffle is a smart word Shuffle game that makes learning vocabularies more fun! It is a very good game that will help you to improve your vocabulary skills. Select the game mode, make as many words as possible and as quickly as possible from the supplied letters in the colorful boxes, to fill all the lines of the empty word slots.

Features:
* 360 unique challenging levels (180 unique English levels + 180 unique Indonesian levels)!
* Two unique challenging game modes, English words and Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia) words!
* 12 English stages and 12 Indonesian stages!
* Smart word shuffle engine!
* Beautiful high-quality graphics!
* Very good music and sounds. You can also play your favourite music while playing the game!
* Leaderboards and unlock achievements!
* In-App Purchases to easily unlock all stages and all levels without having to play and complete them first.
